name: Untitled Unfinished Space Game
description:
A short GGJ protopype that I'd like to turn into a fuller game.

Controls:

space — fly towards cursor

r — restart

left/right click — pick up tool

hold left/right — throw tool (HINT: pay attention to your momentum after you throw)

HINT #2: the machines you need to fix are suffering from three kinds of problems, you also have three kinds of tools available to you, experiment!
